name: Coriander Shrimp In Coconut Milk
keywords: coriander, shrimp, unsweetened coconut milk, main course
recipeIngredient: 2 medium jalapeno peppers, seeded and minced
1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large skillet over medium heat. Add the olive oil, garlic and jalapenos and saute for 15 seconds. Add the wine, raise the heat slightly and simmer for 5 minutes.

Stir in the coconut milk, ginger, salt and pepper. Simmer slowly for 2 minutes. Lower the heat so the liquid is just below a simmer. Add the shrimp and cook until just cooked through, about 5 minutes.
Stir in the lemon zest, lemon juice and coriander. Serve immediately over cooked Basmati rice.
